name: Decay(mobile)
description:
Draw smart shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles.

  • Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, think out of the box and find your own solution.

  • Simple, smart and fun puzzles

  • Smart draw lines algorithm helps you to draw lines freely to complete levels.

If you like Decay, please rate it and leave a comment. Your support is greatly appreciated. If you find problems or don't like something, please email me at : woog.games@gmail.com

I hope you get a lot of fun with this game!
